meanings.definition: A horizontal crossbar in a frame or structure.
meanings.sent1: The traves held up the roof of the small shed.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to bump your head on the traves when entering the barn.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat decided to balance on the traves like a tightrope walker.
meanings.sent4: The traves of friendship connect us all in a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The traves were painted a bright red, standing out against the white walls.

meanings.sent1: The hikers had to traves the river to reach the hidden waterfall.
meanings.sent2: I travesed the busy street carefully, looking both ways.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to traves the road by hopping on passing cars.
meanings.sent4: She travesed the distance between them with a single leap.
meanings.sent5: His determination to traves the mountain was unwavering, despite the challenges.
